articles.description: Nikita Dragun, a popular influencer who is transgender, was arrested and allegedly held in the men's unit at a correctional center in Miami.
articles.content:
Influencer Nikita Dragun made headlines earlier this week when she was arrested in Miami after being caught allegedly walking around a luxury hotel pool naked.

articles.title: Fleishman Is In Trouble is a throwback set in the here and now - The A.V. Club
articles.description: A sharp adaptation of a truly great novel, the FX series is a thriller for people more interested in feelings than plot twists
articles.content: Fleishman Is In Troublemay be set in the present. (There are jokes about dating on the apps and Hamilton, and oblique references to the Orange Nightmare abound.) But FXs latest show is a throwback, s… [+6855 chars]

articles.author: Austen Goslin
articles.title: Witcher: Blood Origin trailer: Michelle Yeoh’s sword elf arrives in December - Polygon
articles.description: Netflix’s Witcher prequel series Blood Origin takes place 1,200 years before the main series and stars Michelle Yeoh as a sword-elf in the latest trailer. The series will release on Dec. 25.
articles.content: The Witcher prequel series arrives on Christmas
